languages.text: "Все святоши — лицемерные ублюдки!" {n}Идира плюет под ноги исповеднику.{/n} "Сначала вещаешь нам, как мы грешны, а поскреби тебя ножичком — найдешь самого отпетого еретика!"

traits.locale_text: "Все святоши — лицемерные ублюдки!" {n}Идира плюет под ноги исповеднику.{/n} "Сначала вещаешь нам, как мы грешны, а поскреби тебя ножичком — найдешь самого отпетого еретика!"

languages.text: "You holy people are all bloody hypocrites!" {n}Idira spits at the confessor's feet.{/n} "You go on about how rotten we are, but take a knife and scratch your surface a little — and we'll find the worst heretic of all!"
languages.original_text: "Все святоши — лицемерные ублюдки!" {n}Идира плюет под ноги исповеднику.{/n} "Сначала вещаешь нам, как мы грешны, а поскреби тебя ножичком — найдешь самого отпетого еретика!"

traits.locale_text: "You holy people are all bloody hypocrites!" {n}Idira spits at the confessor's feet.{/n} "You go on about how rotten we are, but take a knife and scratch your surface a little — and we'll find the worst heretic!"

"You holy people are all bloody hypocrites!" {n}Idira spits at the confessor's feet.{/n} "You go on about how rotten we are, but take a knife and scratch your surface a little — and we'll find the worst heretic of all!"

"You holy people are all bloody hypocrites!" {n}Idira spits at the confessor's feet.{/n} "You go on about how rotten we are, but take a knife and scratch your surface a little — and we'll find the worst heretic of all!"

languages.text: «¡Sois todos una panda de hipócritas, seguidores de lo sagrado!». {n}Idira escupe a los pies del confesor.{/n} «No paras de decir que estamos podridos, pero coge un cuchillo y raspa un poco la superficie... ¡ahí están los peores herejes de todos!».
languages.original_text: "You holy people are all bloody hypocrites!" {n}Idira spits at the confessor's feet.{/n} "You go on about how rotten we are, but take a knife and scratch your surface a little — and we'll find the worst heretic of all!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Sois todos una panda de hipócritas, seguidores de lo sagrado!». {n}Idira escupe a los pies del confesor.{/n} «No paras de decir que estamos podridos, pero coge un cuchillo y raspa un poco la superficie... ¡ahí están los peores herejes de todos!».

languages.text: 「あんたたちのような聖人は、偽善者だ！」{n}イディラは聴罪師の足元に唾を吐いた。{/n}「あたいたちがいかに腐りきっているか説いているようだけど、ナイフで表面を少し引っかいてみようかしら。そうすれば、最悪の異端者を見つけられる！」
languages.original_text: "You holy people are all bloody hypocrites!" {n}Idira spits at the confessor's feet.{/n} "You go on about how rotten we are, but take a knife and scratch your surface a little — and we'll find the worst heretic of all!"

traits.locale_text: 「あんたたちのような聖人は、偽善者だ！」{n}イディラは聴罪師の足元に唾を吐いた。{/n}「あたいたちがいかに腐りきっているか説いているようだけど、ナイフで表面を少し引っかいてみようかしら。そうすれば、最悪の異端者を見つけられる！」

languages.text: “你们这些道貌岸然的家伙，全都是群该死的伪君子！”{n}伊迪拉朝告解神父脚下啐了口口水。{/n}“你们成天大谈特谈我们有多么堕落，但只要拿把刀在你身上轻轻刮一下，我们就找到了最该死的异端分子！”
languages.original_text: "You holy people are all bloody hypocrites!" {n}Idira spits at the confessor's feet.{/n} "You go on about how rotten we are, but take a knife and scratch your surface a little — and we'll find the worst heretic of all!"

traits.locale_text: “你们这些道貌岸然的家伙，全都是群该死的伪君子！”{n}伊迪拉朝告解神父脚下啐了口口水。{/n}“你们成天大谈特谈我们有多么堕落，但只要拿把刀在你身上轻轻刮一下，我们就找到了最该死的异端分子！”

languages.text: "Ihr heiligen Leute seit allesamt verfluchte Heuchler!" {n}Idira spuckt dem Konfessor vor die Füße.{/n} "Ihr mährt Euch aus, wie verdorben wir sind, aber wenn wir mit einem Messer an Eurer Oberfläche schaben ... finden wir den übelsten Ketzer von allen!"
languages.original_text: "You holy people are all bloody hypocrites!" {n}Idira spits at the confessor's feet.{/n} "You go on about how rotten we are, but take a knife and scratch your surface a little — and we'll find the worst heretic of all!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr heiligen Leute seit allesamt verfluchte Heuchler!" {n}Idira spuckt dem Konfessor vor die Füße.{/n} "Ihr mährt Euch aus, wie verdorben wir sind, aber wenn wir mit einem Messer an Eurer Oberfläche schaben ... finden wir den übelsten Ketzer von allen!"

languages.text: « Tous ces parangons de vertu ne sont qu'une bande de fichus hypocrites ! {n}aboie Idira avant de cracher aux pieds du confesseur.{/n} Ces chiens ont beau jeu de nous accuser de tous les maux... quand il suffit de prendre un couteau et de gratter l'épiderme pour découvrir les plus ignobles des hérétiques ! »
languages.original_text: "You holy people are all bloody hypocrites!" {n}Idira spits at the confessor's feet.{/n} "You go on about how rotten we are, but take a knife and scratch your surface a little — and we'll find the worst heretic of all!"

traits.locale_text: « Tous ces parangons de vertu ne sont qu'une bande de fichus hypocrites ! {n}aboie Idira avant de cracher aux pieds du confesseur.{/n} Ces chiens ont beau jeu de nous accuser de tous les maux... quand il suffit de prendre un couteau et de gratter l'épiderme pour découvrir les plus ignobles des hérétiques ! »

languages.text: "Sizin gibi kutsal insanların hepsi ikiyüzlü!" {n}İdira, günah çıkarıcının ayak uçlarına tükürüyor.{/n} "Bizim ne kadar rezil olduğumuzu anlatıp durursunuz ama hepinizi azıcık deşsek gelmiş geçmiş en habis kâfirleri buluruz!"
languages.original_text: "You holy people are all bloody hypocrites!" {n}Idira spits at the confessor's feet.{/n} "You go on about how rotten we are, but take a knife and scratch your surface a little — and we'll find the worst heretic of all!"
